```pddl
[
  '(:action get ; Retrieve an item and update the state
    :parameters (?entity - object ?agent - agent ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?entity ?location) (at ?agent ?location) (not (in_inventory ?agent ?entity)))
    :effect (and (in_inventory ?agent ?entity) (not (at ?entity ?location))))',

  '(:action clean ; Clean a resource and update its state
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and 
      (at ?agent ?loc)
      (at ?item ?loc)
      (or
        (and (basket ?item) (not (full ?item)))
        (and (surface ?item) (in_inventory ?agent cleaning_rag))
        (room ?item)
      )
    )
    :effect (and 
      (or
        (and (basket ?item) (full ?item))
        (and (surface ?item) (clean ?item))
        (and (room ?item) (clean ?item))
      )
    )
  )',

  '(:action pickup ; Pick up an item and update its status
    :parameters (?item - object ?p - agent ?l - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?item ?l) (at ?p ?l))
    :effect (and (in_inventory ?p ?item) (not (at ?item ?l))))'
]
```
